events.description: A family journey from Calgary through Alberta towards the Rockies, experiencing various sights along the way.
events.name: Road trip to the Rockies

events.description: Stopping at a small town diner to enjoy burgers and fries before continuing the journey.
events.name: Lunch at the diner

events.description: Gathering around a campfire at a secluded cabin, roasting marshmallows and sharing stories.
events.name: Evening campfire

locations.description: The city from which the family started their journey, quiet and peaceful in the morning.
locations.name: Calgary

locations.description: A small diner with wooden booths and a jukebox, where they stopped for lunch.
locations.name: Diner

locations.description: A small rustic cabin located near a crystal-clear lake, surrounded by the Rockies.
locations.name: Secluded cabin

locations.description: The area around the cabin where the family gathered around a campfire.
locations.name: Campsite

people.description: James, a sturdy man with graying hair and a calm demeanor, driving the family to the mountains.
people.name: Father

people.description: Evelyn, elegant and caring, wearing a blue dress and taking care of the children during the trip.
people.name: Mother

people.description: A 10-year-old sister with wild blonde curls, bubbling with excitement about the mountains.
people.name: Lucy

time.description: A warm summer day in July 1955, early in the morning until late afternoon.
